sqls.sql: SELECT DISTINCT "商品種別" as value, substr("商品種別",4) as text FROM "MST_出品マスタ情報" WHERE "length" ( 商品種別 ) > 0 AND "店舗ID" = :shopid ORDER BY "商品種別"
SELECT DISTINCT "商品管理番号" AS value, "商品管理番号" AS text FROM "MST_出品マスタ情報" WHERE "length" ( 商品管理番号 ) > 0 AND "店舗ID" = :shopid ORDER BY "商品管理番号"
SELECT DISTINCT "年月" AS value, "年月" AS text FROM "RES_商品別広告明細費用" WHERE "店舗ID" = :shopid ORDER BY "年月" desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT prarent.yearmonths, mst."商品種別" as categories, mst."商品管理番号" as productno, mst."親子区分" as preproduct, mst."分類１" as sub1, mst."分類２" as sub2, mst."ASIN番号" as asin, mst."SKU番号" as sku, mst."LABEL番号" as label, '' as state, '' as type, '' as sponsoredproduct, prarent.sale, cast(prarent.roas as numeric(10,2)) as roas, case when prarent.conversion is null then null else concat(cast(prarent.conversion * 100 as numeric(10,2)),'%') end as conversion, prarent.impressionnumber, prarent.clickvolume, case when prarent.clickrate is null then null else concat(cast(prarent.clickrate * 100 as numeric(10,2)),'%') end as clickrate, prarent.advertisingfee, cast(prarent.averageprice as numeric(10,2)) as averageprice, prarent.orderform, case when prarent.acos is null then null else concat(cast(prarent.acos * 100 as numeric(10,2)),'%') end as acos, prarent.shopid FROM "MST_出品マスタ情報" mst LEFT JOIN ( SELECT r.yearmonths, r.productno, r.categories,
sum(r.sale) as sale,
sum(r.impressionnumber) as impressionnumber,
sum(r.advertisingfee) as advertisingfee,
sum(r.sale) / nullif(sum(r.advertisingfee), 0) as roas,
sum(r.clickvolume) as clickvolume,
sum(r."orderform") / nullif(sum(r.clickvolume), 0) as conversion,
sum(r.clickvolume) / nullif(sum(r.impressionnumber), 0) as clickrate,
sum(r.advertisingfee) / nullif(sum(r.clickvolume), 0) as averageprice,
sum(r."orderform") as orderform,
sum(r.advertisingfee) / nullif(sum(r.sale), 0) as acos, r.shopid FROM ( SELECT mst."年月" as yearmonths, mst."商品種別" as categories, mst."商品管理番号" as productno,
res."ステータス" as state, res."タイプ" as type, res."スポンサープロダクト広告の利用資格" as sponsoredproduct, res."売上(JPY)" as sale, res."ROAS" as roas, res."コンバージョン率" as conversion, res."インプレッション数" as impressionnumber, res."クリック数" as clickvolume, res."クリック率(CTR)" as clickrate, res."広告費(JPY)" as advertisingfee, res."平均クリック単価(CPC)(JPY)" as averageprice, res."注文" as orderform, res."ACOS" as acos,
mst."店舗ID" as shopid FROM ( select M1."年月", M2.* FROM (select distinct "年月" from "RES_商品別広告明細費用") M1 , "MST_出品マスタ情報" M2 WHERE M2."削除フラグ" != '1' and M2."暫定フラグ" = 0 and M2."親子区分" = '子商品' and M2."店舗ID" = :shopid ) mst LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM "RES_商品別広告明細費用" WHERE "店舗ID" = :shopid ) res ON mst."年月" = res."年月" and mst."ASIN番号" = res."ASIN番号" and mst."SKU番号" = res."SKU番号" and mst."店舗ID" = res."店舗ID"
) r GROUP BY r.shopid, r.yearmonths, r.categories, r.productno ) prarent ON mst."商品種別" = prarent.categories and mst."商品管理番号" = prarent.productno
WHERE mst."削除フラグ" != '1' and mst."暫定フラグ" = 0 and mst."親子区分" = '親商品' and mst."店舗ID" = :shopid
UNION ALL
SELECT mst."年月" as yearmonths,
mst."商品種別" as categories, mst."商品管理番号" as productno, mst."親子区分" as preproduct, mst."分類１" as sub1, mst."分類２" as sub2, mst."ASIN番号" as asin, mst."SKU番号" as sku, mst."LABEL番号" as label,
res."ステータス" as state, res."タイプ" as type, res."スポンサープロダクト広告の利用資格" as sponsoredproduct, res."売上(JPY)" as sale, res."ROAS" as roas, case when res."コンバージョン率" is null then null else concat(cast(res."コンバージョン率" * 100 as numeric(10,2)),'%') end as conversion, res."インプレッション数" as impressionnumber, res."クリック数" as clickvolume, case when res."クリック率(CTR)" is null then null else concat(cast(res."クリック率(CTR)" * 100 as numeric(10,2)),'%') end as clickrate, res."広告費(JPY)" as advertisingfee, res."平均クリック単価(CPC)(JPY)" as averageprice, res."注文" as orderform, case when res."ACOS" is null then null else concat(cast(res."ACOS" * 100 as numeric(10,2)),'%') end as acos,
mst."店舗ID" as shopid FROM ( select M1."年月", M2.* FROM (select distinct "年月" from "RES_商品別広告明細費用") M1 , "MST_出品マスタ情報" M2 WHERE M2."削除フラグ" != '1' and M2."暫定フラグ" = 0 and M2."親子区分" = '子商品' and M2."店舗ID" = :shopid ) mst LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM "RES_商品別広告明細費用" WHERE "店舗ID" = :shopid ) res ON mst."年月" = res."年月" and mst."ASIN番号" = res."ASIN番号" and mst."SKU番号" = res."SKU番号" and mst."店舗ID" = res."店舗ID" ) advertinglist LEFT JOIN "MST_ソート情報" S1 on advertinglist."categories" = S1."商品種別" and S1."分類" = '分類１' and advertinglist."sub1" = S1."内容" and advertinglist."shopid" = S1."店舗ID" LEFT JOIN "MST_ソート情報" S2 on advertinglist."categories" = S2."商品種別" and S2."分類" = '分類２' and advertinglist."sub2" = S2."内容" and advertinglist."shopid" = S2."店舗ID" WHERE 1=1 AND ( advertinglist.productno is NULL advertinglist.productno = :productno )
AND ( UPPER(advertinglist.categories) LIKE concat('%', :keyword ,'%') OR UPPER(advertinglist.productno) LIKE concat('%', :keyword ,'%') OR UPPER(advertinglist.preproduct) LIKE concat('%', :keyword ,'%') OR UPPER(advertinglist.sub1) LIKE concat('%', :keyword ,'%') OR UPPER(advertinglist.sub2) LIKE concat('%', :keyword ,'%') OR
UPPER(advertinglist.sku) LIKE concat('%', :keyword ,'%') OR UPPER(advertinglist.asin) LIKE concat('%', :keyword ,'%') OR UPPER(advertinglist.label) LIKE concat('%', :keyword ,'%') )
AND ( advertinglist.categories IN ( @ptype ) )
AND ( advertinglist.yearmonths = :yearmonths )
ORDER BY advertinglist.productno, advertinglist.preproduct DESC, COALESCE(cast(S1."ソート" as varchar), advertinglist."sub1"), COALESCE(cast(S2."ソート" as varchar), advertinglist."sub2"), advertinglist.yearmonths DESC
